HeroSection.title: Nice to meet you! I'm<1> Adrian.</1>
HeroSection.message: A full-stack developer crafting modern web solutions. I blend technical expertise with creative problem-solving to build websites that stand out.

AboutMeSection.title: About Me
AboutMeSection.paragraphOne: Hi, I'm Adrian Goerken, a Full Stack Web Developer with 7 years of experience. My passion for web development comes from solving complex problems and creating impactful solutions that make a difference in people's lives.
AboutMeSection.paragraphTwo: After gaining extensive experience developing warehouse management systems, I've transitioned to freelancing, where I build custom web solutions. My technical toolkit includes React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS for creating responsive user interfaces, while I handle server-side operations with PHP and MySQL, implementing secure authentication through JWTs.
AboutMeSection.paragraphThree: When I'm not coding, you'll find me on the soccer field, following football matches, or diving into a good book. I believe maintaining interests outside of tech helps bring fresh perspectives to problem-solving in development.

itemOne.title: PHP Developer | KBU Logistik AG | Sep 2021 - Dec 2024

list.listItemOne: - Developed a web application for warehouse management system to optimize worker navigation and inventory tracking.
list.listItemTwo: - Implemented feature improvements allowing more efficient menu entry creation with reduced code duplication.
list.listItemThree: - Utilized PHP, JavaScript, Oracle PL/SQL, HTML, and CSS to build and enhance web application functionality.
list.listItemFour: - Collaborated with small team to iteratively develop and maintain logistics software solution.

PrivacyPolicyPage.introText: At Adrian Goerken ('I,' 'my,' 'me'), I am committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring a safe online experience. This Privacy Policy outlines how I collect, use, and protect your personal data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) (EU) 2016/679 and German data protection laws.

section2.title: 2. Website Hosting
section2.description: The website my generate standard server logs for technical purposes, which do not contain personally identifiable information.
